text: Eddie May (born August 30, 1967) is a former Scottish footballer. He was also the head coach of Falkirk. ==Managerial statistics== Managerial record by team and tenure Team Nat From To Record Falkirk 23 June 2009 11 February 2010 Hibernian (caretaker) 26 January 2019 13 February 2019 Hibernian (caretaker) 4 November 2019 15 November 2019 Career Total Career Total Career Total Career Total â€” ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Edinburgh Category:Scottish football managers
